column5: To anyone east of the Stratford area, keep an eye on the skies. Some wicked storms just went through here. A non stop roar of thunder to the north and a bit of hail at here at home. Looks like  all of Southern Ontario at risk of heavy storms.
Yikes, I was going to BBQ in a hour or so, just checked Intellicast.
In southern Kitchener. Its 4:30pm and the storm just started coming through.
Just check the scan. There are many big cells. Im not surprised as the weather we have had this week. it had to come.
This was taken in Sarnia this afternoon.
Another Sarnia image from this afternoon.
It was booming here around midnight, it maybe headed your way?
Crazy, that whole big front on the radar dissipsated over Hamilton never made it this far, not a drop or a kaboom.
trees down in Windsor. gonna be an exciting weekend here. hot  humid   storms

This was taken in Sarnia this afternoon.     nice!!!   also, little known fact, that football field, is a former CFL field from the early 1900's.  The Sarnia Imperials beat the Ottawa Rough Riders in 1934 to win the Grey Cup......

Crazy, that whole big front on the radar dissipsated over Hamilton never made it this far, not a drop or a kaboom.  Crazy is right..........I turned on my radar app and the time lapse showed the blob literally dissolving over a 50 minute span.
I was 10 miles out on lake o we saw it coming and ran for Hamilton put the boat on the trailer and the storm vanished!
